version_description:
New apps: Logical Associations and Magical Multiplications!
Improvements on Super-Buildings, Green City and 3D Chess!

Thanks for choosing Smile and Learn. New this month:

1. New interactive games and stories:
- Learn Your Vowels and Learn Your Consonants: Learn your letters with a game
-Gold Coin: A lovely story to discover the value of honesty
-Mad Lab: A fun game to introduce children to science
-Find the Differences: A game to improve concentration

2. Game update: Paint Art, Digestive System and Respiratory System

3. Enhanced performance: waits cut down, recommendation system interface improved, content removal improved, etc.
